title: feature request: automatic conversion of numpy to torch tensors
body_html: Hi guys, I was wondering if it could be possible to have automatic conversion of numpy arrays implicitly when we use model.forward(x)where x is a numpy array and let torch implicitly transform it to torch tensors. Or when we use it to train the model. That would increase the time of implementation on the user side.
